statements: SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM ConstructionProjects;
SELECT * FROM ConstructionProjects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_id, project_name, completion_status FROM ConstructionProjects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ConstructionProjects WHERE completion_status = 'Not Started' ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, completion_status FROM ConstructionProjects WHERE completion_status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM ConstructionProjects WHERE completion_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT * FROM ConstructionProjects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM ConstructionProjects ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, completion_status FROM ConstructionProjects WHERE end_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM ConstructionProjects WHERE completion_status = 'Completed' OR completion_status = 'Delayed';
SELECT * FROM Project;
SELECT project_name, start_date, deadline_date FROM Project;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, deadline_date FROM Project WHERE project_name LIKE 'P%';
SELECT task_name, status FROM Task ORDER BY deadline_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, task_name, status FROM Project JOIN Task ON Project.project_id = Task.project_id;
SELECT * FROM Project WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, start_date, deadline_date FROM Project ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, status FROM Task WHERE project_id = 2 ORDER BY deadline_date ASC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, project_name FROM Task INNER JOIN Project ON Task.project_id = Project.project_id;
SELECT project_id, COUNT(task_id) AS total_tasks FROM Task GROUP BY project_id;
SELECT * FROM Project;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM Project;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM Task;
SELECT employee_name, position FROM Employee;
SELECT * FROM Task WHERE deadline >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, completion_date
FROM Project
ORDER BY start_date DESC, completion_date ASC
LIMIT 5;

SELECT task_id, task_name, project_id, task_description, deadline
FROM Task
WHERE deadline > CURRENT_DATE
ORDER BY deadline ASC
LIMIT 5;

SELECT project_id, project_name, COUNT(task_id) AS total_tasks
FROM Project
LEFT JOIN Task ON Project.project_id = Task.project_id
GROUP BY project_id
ORDER BY total_tasks DESC
LIMIT 5;

SELECT employee_id, employee_name, position, Project.project_name
FROM Employee
INNER JOIN Project ON Employee.project_id = Project.project_id
ORDER BY employee_name ASC
LIMIT 5;

SELECT project_id, project_name, COUNT(employee_id) AS total_employees
FROM Project
LEFT JOIN Employee ON Project.project_id = Employee.project_id
GROUP BY project_id
ORDER BY total_employees DESC
LIMIT 5;
SELECT project_name, start_date, deadline FROM Projects;
SELECT project_name, deadline FROM Projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT contractor_name, contact_number FROM Contractors;
SELECT task_name, status FROM Tasks WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT project_name, contractor_name, task_name FROM Projects JOIN ProjectAssignments ON Projects.project_id = ProjectAssignments.project_id;
SELECT project_name, start_date, deadline FROM Projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_name, deadline, status FROM Tasks WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT contractor_name, contact_number FROM Contractors ORDER BY contractor_name DESC;

SELECT project_name, task_name, contractor_name, assignment_date FROM Projects p JOIN ProjectAssignments pa ON p.project_id = pa.project_id JOIN Contractors c ON pa.contractor_id = c.contractor_id ORDER BY assignment_date ASC;

SELECT project_name, task_name, contractor_name, deadline FROM Projects p JOIN ProjectAssignments pa ON p.project_id = pa.project_id JOIN Contractors c ON pa.contractor_id = c.contractor_id WHERE deadline < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY project_name, deadline DESC;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, deadline, status FROM tasks WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT member_name, department FROM team_members ORDER BY member_name ASC;
SELECT project_name, task_name, completion_status FROM projects p JOIN tasks t ON p.project_id = t.project_id JOIN project_progress pp ON t.task_id = pp.task_id;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects;
SELECT task_name, deadline, status FROM tasks WHERE status='In Progress';
SELECT member_name, department FROM team_members ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT project_name, task_name, status FROM projects JOIN tasks ON projects.project_id = tasks.project_id;
SELECT task_name, deadline, member_name FROM tasks JOIN task_assignments ON tasks.task_id = task_assignments.task_id JOIN team_members ON task_assignments.member_id = team_members.member_id;
